item.title: Learning ClojureScript. For JavaScript Developers
item.description: Iâ€™ve wanted to add a functional language to my knowledge belt for quite some time now. If you check out my 2013 reading list you may have noticed a Haskell book in there. Haskell was my introduction to thinking without state, but rather with immutable data structures and the syntax was so entirely different from what I was used to with JavaScript that I could not merely port my knowledge for how to solve a problem over in most situations.
